A wine rack to go with your DVD collection. This rack inspired by a film roll spool has all the ingredients to provide drama, emotion and action. You may however need to still provide the wine.

Size: 12"x13"x5.5"
item.title: Wine Rack: Film Reel

item.description:
When she complains about how you sit all day watching cricket and drinking beer you then need to flash this mug, look deep in her eyes say "I love you but this is just my doosra".

For best results use it when the ball is a bit old.
item.title: Cricket Beer Mug- This Is My Doosra

item.description:
Swalapa Adjust maadi is most lkely the first dose of kannada that you will pick.

This phrase is not just a phrase but a way of life.

Our tribute to India's friendliest city.

A set of 2 shot glasses
item.title: Bengaluru Shot Glass

item.description:

item.title: Goa Girls

item.description:
Every one has a 'No Macha' friend and those who don't usually have a 'Yes Da' friend.

Size: 2"-Diameter, 2.5"- Length
item.title: Yes Da, No Macha Shot Glass

item.description: Because nothing goes better with cricket, you should keep the mugs in the freezer and take them out one at a time or refill during every drinks break (even when the 12th man runs in with a message in a bottle). For best results use during every session
item.title: Cricket Beer Mug- Life's A Pitch

item.description:
If poets ran this world Tequila would come from Patiala and Sarson from Mexico, Lassi could come from anywhere including your fridge.

330 ml of happy lassi drinking.
